title: How to Market Like a Genius with Billy Gene
description:
This is the interview all of you entrepreneurs and business marketers have been waiting for! Are you wondering HOW to take full advantage of social media and market yourself or your business like a pro?

I sat down with the marketing genius himself, Billy Gene and am bringing you all of his marketing knowledge, expertise, tips, and tricks! We are bringing the FIRE ðŸ”¥!

With over 300 MILLION VIEWS, Billy Gene is one of the WORLD'S LEADING DIGITAL MARKETING ADVERTISERS! If you want to turn clicks into customers, learn exactly how to create BETTER more IMPACTFUL content and get that content in front of the RIGHT people... You MUST watch/listen to this episode! Be prepared to TAKE NOTES, be BLOWN AWAY, and get the MISSING LINKS to your marketing strategy revealed!
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
